item.title: Why the real poverty line is $140,000, this strategist argues
item.description: A 1963-era calculation no longer makes sense, one strategist says.

item.title: Is it finally ‘game over’ for AI and Big Tech stocks?
item.description: Potential Fed rate cut in December could reignite a ‘risk-on’ flame. Why the market looks to be in ‘early 1999’.

item.title: Novo Nordisk’s oral GLP-1 drug didn’t work on Alzheimer’s as hoped, and the stock tumbles
item.description: Novo Nordisk’s stock tumbles after its oral GLP-1 drug failed to show much benefit over a placebo against Alzheimer’s.

item.title: Rebuffed for the second time, BHP walks away from Anglo American, leaving the path clear for $60 billion merger

item.title: Carvana survived a debt crunch. Can it survive Amazon?
item.description: Carvana’s stunning rebound is facing its biggest test yet: Amazon.
